trans-unit.source: "Gaea's memory is eternal, and she exists in all things."\n—Molimo, maro-sorcerer
trans-unit.target: 「盖亚的记忆永恒不灭，她遍存于万物之中。」 ～玛洛术士莫黎墨

trans-unit.target: 奎利恩哨兵

trans-unit.resname: INV·204 | Quirion Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.
trans-unit.target: 所有的地精都起而反抗非瑞克西亚。奎利恩派出最崇高的能人，运用家乡土壤的力量来应战。

trans-unit.source: Quirion Trailblazer
trans-unit.target: 奎利恩领路人

trans-unit.resname: INV·205 | Quirion Trailblazer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将其横置进场。若你如此做，将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "All that matters is the path ahead."
trans-unit.target: 「眼前的路才重要。」

trans-unit.source: Restock
trans-unit.target: 储备物资

trans-unit.source: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Remove CARDNAME from the game.
trans-unit.target: 将两张目标在你坟墓场中的牌移回你的手上。将CARDNAME移出对战。

trans-unit.source: "We hid such stockpiles all over Rath. We should continue that practice here."\n—Lin Sivvi
trans-unit.target: 「我们在瑞斯各地都有这类储备，所以我们也应该在此地实行。」 ～琳·西薇

trans-unit.source: Rooting Kavu
trans-unit.target: 掘根卡甫

trans-unit.resname: INV·207 | Rooting Kavu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove CARDNAME from the game. If you do, shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，你可以将CARDNAME移出对战。若你如此做，将所有在你坟墓场中的生物牌洗入你的牌库中。

trans-unit.source: Saproling Infestation
trans-unit.target: 腐生蔓延

trans-unit.resname: INV·208 | Saproling Infestation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player pays a kicker cost, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手支付增幅费用时，你将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: "My army took centuries to gather," remarked Urza. "Yavimaya seems to conjure hers out of thin air."
trans-unit.target: 「我的大军花费数百年才得以齐集，」克撒评道，「亚维马雅却像是凭空造就。」

trans-unit.source: Saproling Symbiosis

trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant if you pay o2 more to play it.\nPut a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 若你使用CARDNAME时多支付o2，你便可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下使用它。 你每操控一个生物，便将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, reveal them, and set them aside. Shuffle your library, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量的基本地牌，展示它们，并将之置于一旁。将你的牌库洗牌，然后将该些牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "I have chosen my path. Who will walk it with me?"\n—Eladamri
trans-unit.target: 「我已经选择了道路。有谁要和我同行？」 ～艾拉达力

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.\nLands with an activated ability that doesn't produce mana don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。 具有非用于产生法术力之起动式异能的地，于其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Filter
trans-unit.target: 克撒的滤色镜

trans-unit.resname: INV·318 | Urza's Filter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Multicolored spells cost up to o2 less to play.
trans-unit.target: 多色咒语的费用至多减少o2即可使用。

trans-unit.source: "It's a tool for aiding my other tools," explained Urza. "Now they'll work in harmony."
trans-unit.target: 「它是辅助我其他工具的工具。」克撒解释道，「现在它们运作顺畅。」
